1251310.name: Wonder Land
1251310.description:
Welcome to Wonder Land - a really crazy platformer.
The world in Wonder Land is different - everything you collect has an impact of you or the world.

Collecting beer makes you drunken and the world becomes - can you still control the player through the level?
Why is the world getting darker here ? Cause the candles you collected steals the lights.
Oh and btw: there is coffee which makes you a lot faster- but is this really your friend ?

Features:
  • challenging 2d platformer gameplay mechanic
  • Be Faster, get drunken or it becomes more darker and more dangerous
  • 3 different worlds in Early Access (6 in the full release) with each unique behavior and 4 levels each.
  • Lovely hand drawn pixel art
  • A unique story about a guy stranded on the wonderland island
1251310.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
